name: Brewicide
description:
Controls ------------------------------

Click and drag the sugar cubes to fling them! That's it!

---------------------------------------------------

The eternal struggle between sugar cubes and teabags is without end! Brewicide was made for Trijam 156, with the theme of TEA TIME!

Grab the sugar cubes with your mouse, and then shoot the cubes into the tea packets to force them into cups of hot water! Extra kudos if you get both the tea and sugar into the cup!

Feedback always welcome, and thanks for playing!
